title: BinaryFiNetwork
author: BinaryFiNetwork
content: BinaryFi Network AbstractBinaryFi is a cryptocurrency network that aims to build a bridge protocol between them by handling blockchains in binary. Its main purpose is to address the advantages of blockchains and to offer cryptocurrency investors the advantage of fast, low commission and reliable transactions. In your transactions, Solana blockchain for fast transfer, Ethereum blockchain for reliability structure, Binance Smart Chain blockchain for low commission RPC basics are discussed. Investors use the most appropriate protocol according to the transaction they want to make. BinaryFi (FIB Token) is 90% IPO and aims to earn its basic income through sponsorships, pool partnerships, Pad systems and commission rates.Benefits & Working BinaryFiFast TransferEthereum sends or Bitcoin sends can be transferred using the fundamentals of the Solana blockchain. Up to 2x faster transfer time can be achieved.Safe TransactionAll transfers and dapp developments are protected by reliable and strong crypto encryption methods based on the Ethereum blockchain.Low FeeAll transfers are made using the Binance Smart Chain blockchain infrastructure with the lowest commission amounts.Working LogicBinaryFi has multiple smart contracts. The related blockchains have BinaryFi infrastructures and take care to work synchronously. When transferring Bitcoin, BinaryFi-BTC Smart contract is used and people who want to transfer Bitcoins transmit Bitcoin via the BinaryFi-BTC smart contract as a network. Smart contract BinaryFi(ERC721) for reliable transfer, low commission transfer BinaryFi and fintech can be used based on the BinaryFi(BEP20) Smart contract for fast transfer and the Solana Smart contract for fast transfer.New Generation Staking PoolsBinaryFi, stake pools will be available on the BinaryFi Network, available with multiple blockchains. Solana, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Ethereum etc. financial staking systems of many blockchains It will be accessible and easily manageable through a single DApp.BIFN Token InformationBinaryFi Network BIFN Token is a BEP20 DeFi Token created on the Binance Smart Chain network. BIFN Token has smart contract verified by BSCScan and has been launched using PancakeSwap v2. A total fee of 5% is charged to provide marketing and liquidity in BIFN Token trading. 3% Marketing/Charity and 2% Liquidity commission is charged.Token Contract0xc2ddad5aae33e7bf133be0444633ebe4b9fade6eToken SymbolBIFNTotal Fee3% Marketing & Charity2% Auto-LP (Liquidity)Slippage Range6%Phase 1 (Processing) Launch of the BinaryFi token. Initiation of social media marketing. Introducing AMA event with access to 100 Holders. +250 social media community reach and twitter activity. Initial use of marketing commissions + additional 5 BNB marketing spend. Coinpaprika, Livecoinwatch, Blockspot etc. BIFN Token listing on sites. Start of Farm/Pool Partnership applications for BinaryFi DeFi DApp BETA version.https://binaryfi.network

comments.author: Blowon
